data.title: 200+ best comments for a boy's pic on Instagram to compliment him
data.meta_description: Lovely and well-deliberated comments for a boy's pic will make him smile & brighten his day. Check out this fantastic collection of things to say about his pic.
data.text:
We live in the digital era, where most people meet and interact on various social media platforms. Taking cute selfies and uploading them on social media is the new norm. Do you have a boy you like online? Typing appropriate comments for a boy's pic will get his attention and spark his interest in you.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Best comments for a boy's pic

Short and cute comments for a boy's pic

Flirty comments for a boy's pic

Comments for a boy's pic on Instagram

Hot comments for a boy's pic on Instagram

Flattering comments for a boy's pic

One-word comment for a boy's pic on Instagram

Funny comments for a boy's pic

How do you compliment a guy on his picture?

What should you comment on a boy's pic in one word?

What is the best comment on a photo?

Men love compliments on their pictures, as do ladies. Well-deliberated comments for a boy's pic will make him happy and cheerful. They can also mark the beginning of a beautiful relationship with him.

Here is a collection of the best comments for a boy's pic to catch his attention. Remember, you can always tweak things for some extra oomph.

Here are short and precise comments that will make his day brighter.

Impressive picture.

You look strong and confident.

That’s a perfect gentleman’s pic.

Wow! Looking handsome, buddy.

Great! You should start modelling.

How I love you!

How do you manage to smile well in all your pictures?

A lovely look, dear buddy.

Fashionable and brilliant!

Your wall is always lit.

What a slayer you are!

You are an excellent killer.

I love your dress code.

So lovely to see beautiful pictures like this in my feed.

Wow, you just astounded me beyond the limits.

Lovely picture.

My number one picture today!

Bro, this one is amazing!

You have grown bolder.

Loving this cool vibe look.

This is so dope, bro.

Perfect location for a perfect snap.

This is a million-dollar picture.

Your smile, wow!

You are looking like a star.

Looking so great, bro.

Excellent picture, dude.

Sizzling and smart.

Looking super.

Compelling picture.

That suit is just stunning on you!

Woohoo, looking confident, buddy.

Your charm is genuinely irresistible.

Super cute.

Your humour is the best!

You are so handsome and lovely.

You inspire me!

I am so proud of you!

Handsome slayer.

King of selfies in the world, show me your ways, master.

Flirting generates positivity and is great for well-being. It allows you to show interest through small gestures and enables the other to decide if they want to reciprocate. Here are some flirty comments that will grasp his attention.

Your charm is irresistible!

You are the strongest of all the men!

Shine bright like a star, boy.

This amazing guy is so flawless.

I only have eyes for such gorgeous pictures.

Most handsome boy in the universe.

You are indeed a rock star.

Why can’t I get my eyes off this photo?

Your eyes mean the world to me.

How do you manage to look handsome every day?

Always super smart!

Ever charming!

I was born to love your pictures.

You guy, you complete me.

Hey, my sunshine.

Your handsomeness can never be measured in pixels.

Why are you such cute today?

Hey handsome, is that your name?

You're best, and all others are bad.

Studious (just kidding, don’t take it seriously).

You are so fearless!

You are so attractive!

Your picture made my morning special.

You are breaking the internet.

This cute shirt and you.

Oh! You are the best.

Mind-boggling pic.

Nice biceps.

You are genuinely flawless.

You have a fantastic physique.

Your true colours are beautiful.

I love your dressing sense. Lovely pic.

Bright and intelligent.

Your facial expressions are just wow.

Mornings with the view of your precious face are always the best.

That cute smile and those mesmerising eyes make my heart flutter, trust me!

Only he has the copyright to break the internet with such hot stuff.

This picture made my day. You are so hot!

Wow, you weren’t lying when you said you were hitting the gym!

Dashing look!!

Where do you meet all your favourite people if not on Insta? Boys love compliments as much as girls. Post the best comment for your crush or buddy. A good comment on a handsome boy's pic will catch his attention. Don’t hold yourself back when commenting on IG.

Come and see how my man is energetic!

This is why I love your smile.

Adorable picture.

This is an excellent feast for my eyes!

The pic is better than better itself.

Perfect picture, without any doubt.

Your handsome face is irresistible.

I like you so much.

Gorgeous picture.

Handsome, as always.

The pic made my day bro.

This picture is lit.

Selfie king of the world.

Impressive picture.

Awesome pictures, bro.

Bro, your smile makes me happy

Super cool photo, brother.

Aaaaaahhhh! Teach me how to take a selfie like you. Please!

You are a real gentleman!

Your style is impeccable!

Am loving this killer pic bro.

Keep shining

Partner in crime.

Looking too handsome bro.

You are incomparable.

That's a fantastic pic.

How loving you are! I am so lucky to have you as a friend!

Your style is flawless!

Wow, good to see the fabulous you. You’ve improved a lot.

My life would have been nothing without you guys. I love you all.

You are the funniest human I know.

You are so creative!

I just wish that you keep always smiling, not only by the curve of your lips but from your eyes and your heart.

You look so handsome even when your cameraman fails you.

Who’s that standing behind you? I envy him.

Girls are made to like you, bro. You look super cute.

You are a very, very wondrous and marvellous guy.

OMG! I cannot close my eyes after seeing your pic.

Smiling offers a mood boost and helps our bodies release cortisol and endorphins that provide many health benefits. Make him smile by posting one of these hot comments on Instagram.

You light up a dark room.

I am the biggest fan of your smiling face.

I wish I could like this picture twice.

Awesome and cute.

This classy shot looks so gorgeous.

You are killing it, bro!

Your smile makes me happy.

You look energetic.

You are awesome! I cannot help myself but comment.

I think this is the best I’ve seen in a long time.

Giving you my heart is the best thing I ever could have done.

My world is full of smiles whenever I think of you.

You make me laugh when I don’t even want to smile.

I want to make you feel like you’ve won the lottery.

I think that standing next to you makes me better looking by proximity.

OK, we get it, you're good-looking. Stop making us all jealous.

You're so cute that I didn't even notice the background in this pic.

I cherish the dynamic colours in your picture.

Your elegance is indeed indescribable!

You are an exceptional, marvellous and wondrous boy.

You are a tremendous mess, bro!

You have an incredible characteristic aura. You are full of enormous charm and stunning gorgeousness.

Natural handsomeness for such a brilliant heart.

You are the mesmerising treasury house of handsome.

I am favoured to see your magnificent pictures on my wall.

Your smile is magnificent and fairly enchanted.

You have a lovely and charming grin. No wonder God gave you a chance always to be smiling.

How do you always manage to smile so well?

You have such a cute and beautiful smile that even God gives you every chance to smile.

The world wanted me to let you know that it's so grateful for you. Thanks for blessing us with this selfie.

You are seriously planning to kill your fans by posting such pics, aren't you?

Few can act or deliver dialogue with their eyes, and you're one of them. Just love the intensity of your eyes!

You're wow. Just wow.

That smile is dangerous.

No one should be allowed to look that good. How do you do it?

When I see your picture on my feed, my day is all made.

I am now not thankful for anything aside from seeing your cute pictures on my feed.

I want to see such pictures for the rest of my life.

I wonder how handsome you look when sleeping.

You are the sweetest boy on my feed.

If you have been wondering how to tell a guy he's attractive, you can do it by commenting on his pictures online. Like anyone else, guys appreciate admiration. An aesthetic comment on a boy's pic will flatter him today and make his day extra special.

We know more than anyone that your eyes are never quiet.

Your perfection adds tons of value to others' lives.

May you continue to achieve great milestones in your life.

And, suddenly, I realised all the love songs were about you. It's a good morning for me.

I would pay a million dollars to build a personality like yours.

You look so babyish with that smile of yours. God bless you always. Stay blessed & make us smile like this.

I was studying, and I saw your notification. Boom! I'm distracted now.

The innocence of your eyes and the cuteness of your face is just lovely.

Your face and look are glowing bright like a red cross.

You are getting me envious, bro. Such an incredible picture deserves a medal.

You are constantly changing drastically for good.

No one makes me smile on my feeds more than you.

I dare to say that you look insane in this picture!

You are ever shining in your pictures, dude.

Wow! This is the kind of picture you cannot scroll past without double-tapping.

This is the best picture I have ever seen since joining this platform.

I am the kind of person that would love to have a group of friends who are as handsome as you are.

I just cannot stop thinking about how handsome you are.

This is undoubtedly your best look. You are incredibly handsome in this outfit.

You are the symbol of handsomeness.

The world is worthless without friends who post such cute pictures.

You are the most handsome man living in this era, the most I have ever seen so far.

I like how you are always comfortable in your world.

You look flawless, outstanding, lovely, eccentric, and handsome. You are the true definition of what being handsome is.

Bro, you make me feel like a lady.

Indeed, why are the police not arresting you for looking immensely handsome?

You are a stunning, incredible and handsome, good-looking man.

Inside or out, you are still handsome.

Just want to let everyone know my best friend looks this good all day, every day.

I am thankful for having such a handsome man in my life.

Pretty excited that I found this pic from ages ago.

Can I get your autograph? I'm your number one fan.

What did I just see? Isn't that amazing? Oh, sorry, it is you!

Wow, who made you? What are you made of?

Hello, Mr World this year.

That bow tie looks nice on you.

For me, you are astounding. You will always continue to be excellent.

This is one of my favourite picture postures of you.

You are the true meaning of excellence.

This snap is worth a billion words.

A simple, genuine compliment is one of the most underestimated acts of kindness in contemporary society. A one-word comment on a gym boy's pic will make him smile. One-word compliments are also excellent for boys who do not go to the gym.

Did you know jokes sharpen our sensibilities and tune our capabilities? You can use hilarious comments on your boyfriend's or buddy's pictures. Be careful when joking with a crush because you do not want them to get the wrong impression.

Hey, my shirt!! You promised me to return it soon.

Bro, help me figure out which is tighter. That pair of jeans you are wearing in this picture or our friendship.

Just when I could not love you anymore, you dropped this picture on your wall. My jaw has fallen to the floor!

Hello, 911. I need to report a #fire selfie.

Let’s order pizza tonight.

I’m glad you’re just as weird as I am.

Is your name WiFi? Because I see a connection here.

My hobbies include crushing on you.

Give that man some bacon

Making this picture my phone background now.

Casually making my heart melt like a popsicle.

Shut up and take my money.

I licked it, so it’s mine.

You should be banned from wearing this outfit. Facepalm.

I wonder how God can create this bizarre human being, make him cute, adorable and deny him brains!

Hey guys, follow this handsome guy to learn about the latest Snapchat filters.

I have heard of the seven wonders of the world. It looks like we might have the 8th!

Which photo editor are you using?

Your parents must be bakers. They made such a cute pie together!

Can I save this picture? I want to give Santa my wish list.

I hope your day will consist of fast traffic and the supermarket queues will be shorter so that you can come back here to post such adorable pictures.

I was so bored at work, and this picture rescued me from the boredom.

You shake my feed, dude!

Day turned into night. Lights changed, but not the spark and blush of my cheeks.

How do you compliment a guy on his picture?

You can compliment him with nice words that express how you feel about him. If you are searching for a stylish comment on a boy's pic, check out the collection above.

You should comment with the adjective that best describes him. Be genuine when choosing it.

The best comment is kind and genuine. It expresses how you feel about the picture or person without being mean or insensitive.

Writing nice comments for a boy's pic on Instagram to compliment him will make his day brighter and happier. You can use the above comments on your boyfriend's, buddy's, or crush's latest pictures.

Tuko.co.ke recently published a list of savage smooth pick-up lines for her that'll land you a date. Sometimes, a little audacity mixed with eloquence can make a striking impression in the game of love and attraction.

Savage smooth pick-up lines are the perfect blend of boldness and charm that can amuse and potentially captivate her interest. These aren't your typical, cheesy pick-up lines; they are clever, witty, and daring icebreakers that will leave an unforgettable imprint.
